column1: ap 01:00|one|"NYX LASHED HER WHIP AGAIN. The darkness congealed around her. On either side
column2: an army of shadows appeared—more dark-winged arai
column3: which Annabeth was not thrilled to see; a withered man who must have been Geras
column4: the god of old age; and a younger woman in a black toga
column5: her eyes gleaming and her smile like a serial killer’s—no doubt Eris
column6: the goddess of strife. More kept appearing: dozens of demons and minor gods
column7: each one the spawn of Night."|"The House of Hades"|"Rick Riordan"

column1: 12:00|MIDDAY|"DESPITE THE MIDDAY HEAT and the raging storm of death energy
column2: a group of tourists was climbing over the ruins. Fortunately there weren’t many
column3: and they didn’t give the demigods a second look."|"The House of Hades"|"Rick Riordan"
